sections.title: 1. Marqués Golf Resort — Finestrat-Benidorm
sections.content: Marqués Golf Resort represents the pinnacle of luxury residential golf living on Costa Blanca, developed by Grupo Immosol. This exclusive complex features 78 premium maisons arranged across five blocks with guaranteed Mediterranean mer and golf parcours views thanks to innovative side-window design architecture. Each unit offers 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with expansive day areas, triple-insulated exterior walls for soundproofing and energy efficiency, and large terraces ideal for outdoor living. The resort boasts three swimming pools with integrated jacuzzis, a fully equipped wellness center with gym and spa facilities, paddle tennis courts, and extensive landscaped green spaces. Located near Puig Campana Golf parcours and premium Costa Blanca plages, the development is less than 30 minutes from Alicante International Airport. Prices range from €450,000 to €750,000, with March 2026 completion delivering immediate purchase-to-occupancy advantage for investors seeking golf mode de vie propriétés.

sections.title: 2. JADE 2 — Calpe
sections.content: JADE 2 stands as Calpe's most iconic beachfront development, positioned just 200 meters from Arenal plage on the ville's main avenue with unobstructed Mediterranean views. This prestigious project comprises two 15-story towers offering modern 2-bedroom (from €387,000) and 3-bedroom appartements (from €449,000), plus two exclusive 4-bedroom penthouses on the 15th floor. All units feature expansive terraces with seascape views, and floors from level 7 upwards enjoy panoramic vistas toward Las Salinas nature reserve. Premium amenities include two lagoon-style swimming pools with plage access, landscaped sunbathing areas with artificial grass, fully-equipped gymnasium, paddle tennis court, secure underground parking, and children's playground. The privileged location on a plot with no buildings in front guarantees permanent view preservation—a rarity on developed Costa Blanca coastlines. International ownership is favored here, with significant UK and Nordic investor interest.

sections.title: 3. Sierra Cortina — Finestrat
sections.content: Sierra Cortina represents Costa Blanca's most sought-after residential enclave for discerning buyers prioritizing privacy, security, and landscape views. This low-density development features contemporary villas and townhouses designed for maximum luxury and exclusivity. Seaview 6 within Sierra Cortina offers 3-4 bedroom villas from 155 square meters and 3-bedroom townhouses from 106 square meters, all featuring private gardens or pools, contemporary architecture, and parking facilities, starting at €495,000. Independent villa developments within Sierra Cortina comprise 30 avant-garde units on plots exceeding 400 square meters with options for pools and landscaping customization. Located 5-10 minutes from pristine plages and coves, Sierra Cortina residents enjoy proximity to championship golf courses, international schools, medical facilities, and upscale shopping centers while maintaining peaceful, gated-communauté living. The consistent 15%+ annual propriété appreciation makes Sierra Cortina an investor favorite for capital growth alongside mode de vie quality.

sections.title: 4. Las Colinas Golf & Country Club — Dehesa de Campoamor, Orihuela Costa
sections.content: Las Colinas Golf & Country Club celebrates its 15th anniversary in 2026 as one of Continental Europe's premier golf and residential resort destinations. This world-class facility features an 18-hole championship parcours recognized in the Top 100 Golf Courses in Continental Europe (Golf World Magazine 2014) and awarded 'Espagne's Best Golf parcours' at the World Golf Awards in 2015 and 2016. The 2026 anniversary celebration includes the prestigious 15th Anniversary Golf Tournament (August 1) and the 5th edition of Las Colinas Trophy (December 5-6), attracting international golfing elite. Beyond golf, the resort offers international dining at multiple venues including UNIK café, Enso Sushi Bar, and new Italian restaurant il Palco, plus a comprehensive sports and health club with spa treatments. New residential propriétés available for 2026 completion offer front-line golf views, elevated resort amenities, and investissement appreciation potential in Espagne's most established and prestigious golf communauté.

sections.content: Aqua Blanca maisons represents cutting-edge sustainable living in Alicante, featuring 87 modern appartements with 2-3 bedrooms in the PAU 5 district, just a 10-minute walk from San Juan and Muchavista plages. Certified PASSIVHAUS for exceptional energy efficiency, all appartements feature integrated photovoltaic panels generating 100% renewable electricity from on-site solar pergolas. propriétés range from 80-102 square meters, priced between €378,000 and €580,000, with expected 2026 completion. Premium finishes include high-quality kitchens with appliances, fully-equipped bathrooms, and abundant natural lighting. communauté amenities feature landscaped green zones, large swimming pool, children's play areas, secure bicycle parking, and multi-purpose social spaces. Located in a consolidated neighborhood near Golf parcours, supermarkets, pharmacies, sports clubs and Sergio Malgares park, Aqua Blanca combines plage proximity, sustainability credentials, and investissement fundamentals appealing to environmentally-conscious European buyers seeking beachfront living at exceptional value.

sections.title: 6. Horizon Resort — San Miguel de Salinas
sections.content: Horizon Resort exemplifies modern, famille-oriented coastal living in San Miguel de Salinas, featuring 108 stylish bungalow-style appartements completing in late September 2026. This contemporary development offers flexible configurations: ground-floor maisons with private gardens (ideal for families) and top-floor maisonettes featuring expansive rooftop solariums perfect for entertaining and Mediterranean sunset viewing. Two and 3-bedroom options are priced competitively from €189,900 and €249,900 respectively, making them the most accessible entry point for Costa Blanca investors. Each appartement includes open-plan living, fully-equipped modern kitchens with induction cooking, two bathrooms, built-in wardrobes, and premium finishes throughout. Residents enjoy two communal swimming pools, children's play areas, and vibrant communauté life. Located within walking distance of San Miguel de Salinas' shopping and dining district, yet just 10-15 minutes from blue-flag plages at Orihuela Costa and Torrevieja, Horizon Resort delivers unbeatable value for owner-occupiers and rental-yield investors seeking South Costa Blanca propriétés.

Each villa encompasses approximately 180 square meters across three floors (including basement), situated on plots averaging 400 square meters, allowing for private pool construction, landscaping customization, and unobstructed sightlines. Sophisticated floor plans accommodate up to six bedrooms with six bathrooms, private pools, and Mediterranean gardens designed for indoor-outdoor living. The modern Mediterranean aesthetic combines clean lines, generous glazing, and natural materials reflecting Moraira's sophisticated character. Pricing positions Botticelli as Moraira's accessible luxury offering, though seaview villas in prime locations exceed €700,000, with exclusive waterfront propriétés reaching multimillion-euro valuations. Moraira attracts affluent international ownership (particularly from Nordic and Central European markets), creating strong rental demand and consistent propriété appreciation in one of Costa Blanca's most desirable residential communities.

sections.content: Mirador de Guardamar represents beachfront living excellence in the charming coastal ville of Guardamar del Segura, located on Callesa with the Mediterranean plage just 700 meters away. This exquisite new construction development features spacious semi-detached villas with 3 bedrooms, modern finishes, and starting prices from €434,000—exceptional value for South Costa Blanca plage proximity. The low-density residential design maintains neighborhood character while offering secure gated communauté living with contemporary amenities. Guardamar del Segura offers authentic Spanish coastal charm with less commercial development than neighboring Torrevieja and Orihuela Costa, appealing to buyers prioritizing tranquility alongside plage accessibility. The 19-maison residential complex features abundant green spaces, professional landscaping, and communauté facilities supporting famille-oriented living. Recent propriété market data indicates 15% annual price appreciation in Guardamar, with particular investor interest in new-build offerings combining plage proximity with character village living—positioning Mirador de Guardamar as an intelligent value investissement for 2026.

sections.content: Orihuela Costa's largest building project in over a decade represents a transformative waterfront development on the final undeveloped coastline section, occupying 456,000 square meters with 1.2 kilometers of plage frontage. Planning permission authorizes 1,500 new maisons between Punta Prima and Playa Flamanca, designed accommodating diverse resident demographics including adaptive living communities and senior-living residences within protected flora and fauna reserves. This mega-project will fundamentally reshape Orihuela Costa's residential character, offering contemporary amenities reflecting current mode de vie expectations: modern design, sustainable building practices, secure communities, and integrated commercial/dining/wellness facilities.
